nodes.text: Singing Stone was a maroon gemstone that existed during the struggle between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Singing Stone was introduced to the Star Wars Legends continuity as a crafting material in Update 4.1 of the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online role-playing game, Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was launched as part of the Knights of the Fallen Empire expansion in 2016. Singing stones first appeared in the 2015 Star Wars canon novel Dark Disciple, written by Christie Golden. The novel adapts an unfinished eight-episode story arc for the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series which was written by Katie Lucas, Matt Michnovetz, and Dave Filoni.
